HighScore
 
HighScoreActivity
This class creates save the name of users in the database, also set on click listener for button to show the name of high scorers
HighScoreAdapter
this class has a adapter to show the high scorer's name saved in database
HighScoreAdapter.HighScoreItemClickListener
Interface for item click events
HighScoreAdapter.ViewHolder
viewholder class extend the recyler view to show the high scorer in a scrollable view

this class shows the category of topics you can choose from

A class to enter the name of user

A question adapter class to show questions through scrolling

A class to attempt the class

This class shows the question for each category when user select the question number by connecting API and downloading it

A start activity to show the quiz icon
